issue_title: [Bug] Method name 'list' shadows Python built-in function

triage.root_cause: Method name 'list' in TodoApp class shadows Python's built-in list() function
risk_points: Method name shadows built-in list() type/constructor
Creates ambiguity and violates PEP 8 naming conventions
Could cause issues with code analysis tools and IDE autocompletion

changes.description: Update call sites to use 'list_todos' (3 occurrences)
Update call sites to use 'list_todos' (5 occurrences)

verification.linter_checks: uv run ruff check - All checks passed
